full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Microwave Link Services**
----------------------------

**Reference and Solicitation Information**
----------------------------------------

*   **Solicitation Reference Number:** PW-22-01013313
*   **Solicitation Number:** W6399-22-LJ93/B
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-11-14

**Tender Operational Information**
-------------------------------

*   **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2022-11-23T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2022-11-17
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Services Required**
-------------------

*   This procurement is for Microwave Link Services.
*   The tender includes a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Microwave Link Services to the Department of National Defence.

**Contracting Authority and Entity Information**
---------------------------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   101 Colonel By Dr
    *   Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
    *   Canada

**Contract Details**
------------------

*   **Estimated quantity of commodity:** #######
*   **Duration of contract:** (YYYY-MM-DD) to (YYYY-MM-DD)
*   **Time frame of delivery:** (YYYY-MM-DD) to (YYYY-MM-DD)

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

*   The Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) applies to this procurement. Suppliers are required to include the estimated quantity of commodity and duration of the contract in their description.
*   Amendments have been made to the Request for Proposal (RFP). Amendment 1 was posted on 2022-11-17, and a Q&A document was also published.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   **Contact Name:** Costain, Angelina
*   **Contact Email:** angelina.costain@forces.gc.ca
*   **Contact Phone Number:** 613-945-2729

**Additional Resources**
-------------------------

*   The Request for Proposal (RFP) document can be found here: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/14/7229b00d3968d77924d5f2c43ba4a71a/w6399-22-lj93_npp_bilingual.pdf
*   Amendment
